SEARCH
Package Accounts

Interface IMenuManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
BranchManager
public interface IMenuManagement
Interface defining menu management capabilities for branches. Implementing classes will be able to view, add, remove, and edit menu items.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addMenuItem(Branch branch)
    Adds a new menu item to the menu of a specified branch.
    void
    editMenuItem(Branch branch)
    Edits an existing menu item in the menu of a specified branch.
    void
    removeMenuItem(Branch branch)
    Removes a menu item from the menu of a specified branch.
    void
    viewMenu(Branch branch)
    Displays the menu for a specified branch.

  • Method Details

    • viewMenu

      void viewMenu(Branch branch)
      Displays the menu for a specified branch.
      Parameters:
      branch - The branch whose menu is to be displayed.

    • addMenuItem

      void addMenuItem(Branch branch)
      Adds a new menu item to the menu of a specified branch.
      Parameters:
      branch - The branch to which a new menu item will be added.

    • removeMenuItem

      void removeMenuItem(Branch branch)
      Removes a menu item from the menu of a specified branch.
      Parameters:
      branch - The branch from which a menu item will be removed.

    • editMenuItem

      void editMenuItem(Branch branch)
      Edits an existing menu item in the menu of a specified branch.
      Parameters:
      branch - The branch whose menu item is to be edited.
